title: The Gibeonite Deception
summary: Joshua 9 tells how the Gibeonites deceive Israel into making a peace treaty by pretending to be from a distant land. Though Israel did not seek Godâ€™s counsel, they honor the treaty but make the Gibeonites servants.

faq.question: How did the Gibeonites trick Israel?
faq.answer: They wore worn-out clothes and carried moldy bread to appear as distant travelers.

faq.question: What did Israel do wrong?
faq.answer: They made a treaty without consulting God.
